abstract.t: This document provides an overview of MPLS-TP OAM tools, including MPLS-TP OAM functions, generic mechanisms for supporting MPLS-TP OAM; MPLS-TP Fault management tools; and Performance Management tools defined in IETF, OAM toolset utilization, and IANA assigned code point under G-Ach discussion. The protocol definitions for each individual MPLS-TP OAM tool are specified in separate RFCs (or Working Group documents while this document is work in progress) which this document references.
